attributes.action: HELP STOP Mcdonalds from taking over The Dutch House
attributes.additional_details: We would like help in stopping companys like Mcdonalds taking over local estate pubs/restaurants that offer healthier food options and bring local and near by communities together (such as disability groups on days out) and turning them into fast food restaurants selling unhealthy food. HELP SAVE THE DUTCH HOUSE ON SIDCUP ROAD SE12 9AL
